text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump ISN’T IT HORRIFIC ENOUGH THAT YOU IGNORED THE FIRST WARNINGS OF COVID19? GOD ALMIGHTY, YOU’RE NOW DOUBLING DOWN & IGNORING A SECOND WAVE THAT WILL HIT THIS FALL?? WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU? WE WILL HAVE 100,000 DEAD BY JUNE! FALL WILL BE WORSE! OMG!
